kubernetes_stateful_set.description: StatefulSet is a Kubernetes resource used to manage stateful applications.

metadata.description: Standard Kubernetes object metadata. For more info see [Kubernetes reference](https://github.com/kubernetes/community/blob/master/contributors/devel/sig-architecture/api-conventions.md#metadata)

spec.description: Spec defines the specification of the desired behavior of the stateful set. For more info see [Kubernetes reference](https://github.com/kubernetes/community/blob/master/contributors/devel/sig-architecture/api-conventions.md#spec-and-status)
